title: Kaloko-Honok≈çhau National Historical Park: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do      Step back in time to the Hawai'i of yesterday.  Explore how Hawaiians survived and thrived on such a seemingly hot, desolate and barren landscape.  Marvel at the ingenuity and engineering skills used to construct the fishponds and fish trap.  Immerse yourself in the clear blue Pacific Ocean and discover corals reefs and tropical fishes.  Walk along the peaceful seashore, watch the sunset and feel the spirit of Kaloko-Honokohau.
